questions.question_text:
While performing database backup to tape via the media manager interface, you notice that tape streaming is not happening because RMAN is not sending data blocks fast enough to the tape drive.
Which two actions would you take for tape streaming to happen during the backup?

choices.F: Configure large_pool, if not done already. Alternatively, you can increase the size of
choices.B: Configure the channel to increase maxopenfiles.
choices.D: Configure the channel to increase capacity with the rate parameter.
choices.C: Configure a backup policy by using incremental backups.
choices.E: Configure the channel to adjust the tape buffer size by using the 3LKSIZE option.

choices.D: capturing the most resource-intensive SQL statements in a SQL Tuning Set on the production system and using the SQL Tuning Advisor on the test system
choices.A: capturing the most resource-intensive SQL statements in a SQL Tuning Set on the production system and using the SQL Performance Analyzer on the test system
choices.C: capturing the workload on the production system and using Consolidated Database Replay to replay the workload of all production systems simultaneously for all PDBs
choices.B: capturing the workload on the production system and replaying the workload for one PDB at a time on the test system

questions.question_text:
You want to consolidate databases for the CRM, ERP, and SCM applications by migrating them to pluggable databases (PDBs).
You have already created a test system to support the consolidation of databases in a multitenant container database (CDB) that has multiple PDBs.
What is the easiest way to perform capacity planning for consolidation?

choices.B: Optional destinations cannot use the fast recovery area.
choices.D: These settings work only if log__archive_min_succeed_dest is set to a value of 4.
choices.A: An online redo log file is not allowed to be overwritten if the archived log file cannot be created in any of the log_archive_dest_.n destinations.
choices.C: An online redo log file is not allowed to be overwritten if the archived log file cannot be created in the location specified for log_archive_dest_4.

questions.question_text:
Your database is running in archivelog mode. Examine the initialization parameters you plan to set for your database instance.
LOG_ARCHIVE_DEST_1 = 'LOCATION=/disk1/arch'
LOG_ARCHIVE_DEST_2 = 'L0CATI0N=/disk2/3rch'
LOG_ARCHIVE_DEST_3 = 'LOCATION=/disk3/arch'
L0G_ARCHIVE_DEST_4 = 'L0CATI0N=/disk4/3rch MANDATORY'
Identify the statement that correctly describes these settings.
